title: How is sampled music scored? - Quora

response.answer_text: To me it's the same process. The only difference is that instead of hearing it in my mind (when I am composing) I get to hear a recording. But it's the same thing. You need to figure out what instrument to use for the sounds you hear and what the notes are. It will be an approximation in both cases, of course. You can hear things in your mind that cannot be reproduced on an instrument the same way everything computerized can't.
